content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0)
Consists of steam engine (position 1), boiler (position 2), and offshore pump (position 3).

### Copper plate mine at position(4)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 5) and a furnace at position(6).
- Burner mining drill (position 7) and a furnace at position(8).
- Burner mining drill (position 9) and a furnace at position(10).

### Copper cable factory at position(11)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(12) and inserter at position(13) that puts into the assembling machine.
- Beltgroup (position 14) that connects the furnace at position(6) to the assembling machine at position(12).

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough required resources in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, to craft Iron Gear Wheel, you need 2 iron plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when crafting without the necessary machines
- Verify that you have the required crafting machines or furnaces available for the recipes you are trying to use.
